description: The story captures the light-hearted banter and camaraderie on a golf course, centered around a classic golf joke.
title: The Extra Pair
n_1: Mike is preparing for his golf game, rummaging through his bag.
n_2: Sarah, curious, walks over to Mike, who proudly holds up a pair of pants.
n_3: Mike grins, ready to deliver his punchline.
n_4: They both share a laugh, enjoying the sunny day on the golf course.
c1_1: Ah, here it is! My secret weapon!
c2_1: What's that, an extra pair of pants?
c1_2: Yes, you never know when you might need it.
c1_3: In case I get a hole in one!
c1_4: Golf humor, you gotta love it!
